first_para: David John Nuttall (born 25 March 1962) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is Member of Parliament (MP) for Bury North, having won his seat in the House of Commons at the 2010 general election.

full.extract:
David John Nuttall (born 25 March 1962) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is Member of Parliament (MP) for Bury North, having won his seat in the House of Commons at the 2010 general election.
^ "David Nuttall MP". BBC Democracy Live (BBC). Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ http://www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/59418/notices/1118281/from=2010-05-06;to=2010-05-19;all=returned+westminster/
^ "Election 2010: Bury North". BBC News. 7 May 2010. Retrieved 14 May 2010.
full.title: David Nuttall
